channel.title: Possible Helicopter Glitch? - Surface Tension
channel.description:
On the cliff side helicopter fight, I hit the helicopter with a rocket (or two, can't remember off of the top of my head) the helicopter seemed to just float there and fire to the left, completely ignoring me. I was able to walk out and fire my rockets at it until it blew up. The death animations/explosions all worked fine though.
And sorry, I forget to take screenshots. :/
